name: Elden Ring
description: FromSoftware tomonidan yaratilgan ochiq dunyodagi epik sarguzasht.

name: Hollow Knight
description: Qorong‘i yer osti dunyosida kichik ritsarning sirli sayohati.

name: The Witcher 3: Wild Hunt
description: Geralt ismli yirtqich ovchining o‘tkir hikoyasi va tanlovga asoslangan o‘yin.

name: Cyberpunk 2077
description: Kelajakdagi Night Cityda kiborlar va texnologiya orasidagi kurash.

name: Red Dead Redemption 2
description: Vahshiy G‘arbdagi jinoyatchilarning so‘nggi davrini hikoya qiluvchi o‘yin.

name: Sekiro: Shadows Die Twice
description: Yapon samurayi Sekironing qasos yo‘lida o‘tkir janglari.

name: Dark Souls III
description: Qorong‘i va xavfli dunyoda sinovli janglar bilan to‘la sarguzasht.

name: God of War
description: Kratos va o‘g‘li Atreusning Norvegiya xudolariga qarshi kurashi.

name: Ghost of Tsushima
description: Samuray Jin Tsushimaning erkinlik uchun kurashi.

name: Assassin's Creed Mirage
description: Bag‘dod ko‘chalarida yashirin suiqasdchi Basimning sarguzashti.

name: Minecraft
description: Cheksiz dunyoda qurish, kashf etish va omon qolish o‘yini.

name: Terraria
description: 2D dunyoda qazish, jang qilish va yaratuvchanlik aralashgan o‘yin.

name: Celeste
description: Madeline ismli qizning ruhiy to‘siqlarni yengish haqidagi sayohati.

name: Stardew Valley
description: Qishloq xo‘jaligi, munosabatlar va tinch hayotga asoslangan o‘yin.

name: Baldur’s Gate 3
description: D&D asosidagi chuqur hikoya va tanlovlarga boy RPG.

name: DOOM Eternal
description: Demonlarga qarshi tezkor, zo‘r grafikali otishma o‘yini.

name: Hades
description: Zagreusning Ahd dunyosidan qochish urinishlari va janglari.

name: Death Stranding
description: Post-apokaliptik dunyoda izolyatsiyani yengib o‘tish hikoyasi.

name: Resident Evil 4 Remake
description: Leon S. Kennedining xavfli qutqaruv missiyasi va dahshatli muhit.

name: The Last of Us Part I
description: Joel va Ellie bilan insoniyatning vayron bo‘lgan dunyosidagi omon qolish hikoyasi.
